apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji on Apple devices portrays a woman and a person with a medium-dark skin tone sharing a gentle kiss, with a flurry of hearts symbolizing their affection. Apple's 3D design language brings a soft, romantic glow to the scene, with the hearts shimmering with glossy highlights and smooth gradients. The figures are depicted with Apple's signature rounded edges and subtle shading, conveying intimacy, romance, and a sweet expression of love or longing.
